title: connection issue
body:
I am unable to connect to the authentication service, but I can log in on my roommate's computer.
I tried to close the firewall, restart PC, and even reinstall the game, it still does not work.
How can I fix it?

replies.body:
First I'd recommend following through any steps in this article you haven't already: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Failing that, submit a ticket to player support and they should be able to help you further: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
